articles.title: Twitch scraps ad changes after streamers leave platform - BBC
articles.description: One streamer tells BBC News this is the push he needed to leave the platform altogether.
articles.content:
Twitch is scrapping its own new advertising rules, following a backlash that saw streamers leave the platform.
The Amazon-owned livestreaming service had said it would restrict the size and type of … [+3598 chars]

articles.title: Francoise Gilot: Artist, writer and Picasso's former lover, dies at 101 - BBC
articles.description: Gilot, who was 101, emerged from Picasso's shadow to become acclaimed as an artist in her own right.
articles.content:
Francoise Gilot, who emerged from the shadow of her lover Pablo Picasso to become acclaimed as an artist in her own right, has died at the age of 101.
